mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cdbltjjz),0) as xdje FROM hs_xsdddjys_tb WHERE dhlx IN('日常返单' ,'重装-赠送') AND xspzlx='OR' AND jjzt='A' AND dhdh LIKE 'JD%' and jxskhbm=#{jxskhbm} and cjny=#{cjny}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cdbltjjz),0) as xdje FROM hs_xsdddjys_tb WHERE xspzlx='OR' AND jjzt='A' AND dhdh LIKE 'JD%' and jxskhbm=#{jxsbm} and cjny=#{cjny}
